content: is there such a thing as  OSM intent for Android that uses tileserver other than Mapnik/OSM (eg MapBox?)?

Yes, there are several OSM intent libraries for Android that support using tile servers other than Mapnik/OSM. One popular library is called "OSMBonusPack" which provides a set of helpful tools and UI components for working with OpenStreetMap data on Android. It allows you to use custom tile sources, including MapBox tile servers. 

You can find more information and examples on how to use OSMBonusPack library by visiting their GitHub repository: https://github.com/MKergall/osmbonuspack
